newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's three-mth, six-mth BUBOR rates drop.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's three-mth, six-mth BUBOR rates drop.

text.p: Hungary's Budapest Interbank Offered Rates (BUBOR) dropped one basis point for the three- and six-month maturities on Monday, while the one-month rate was unchanged, the National Bank of Hungary (NBH) said on its BUBOR Reuters page.
The one-month rate was fixed at 20.50 percent, the three-month rate at 20.13 percent and the six-month rate at 19.71 percent.
